messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: [A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine you are traveling through Asia. You start in New Delhi and have two choices, you can go to Islamabad or Kathmandu. From Islamabad, you can go to Kabul and from there to Tehran. In Tehran, your total expenses will be $1000 including hotels, shopping and sight-seeing. After learning this, you return to New Delhi. This time, you choose Kathmandu, which leads to Beijing, and from there you can go to Thimphu, where you have $400 total expenses. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the least expensive destination. Which city from New Delhi will lead to the path where one can find the least expensive destination?

Step 1: Identify the two paths and their respective expenses.
Path 1: New Delhi -> Islamabad -> Kabul -> Tehran (Total expenses: $1000)
Path 2: New Delhi -> Kathmandu -> Beijing -> Thimphu (Total expenses: $400)

Step 2: Compare the total expenses of both paths.

Step 3: Determine the path with the least expensive destination.

Answer: Kathmandu

You start in New Delhi and this time you encounter a new route, which leads to Yangon which leads to Dhaka. From Dhaka, you can go to Bangkok from where you can fly to any city you want. When you return to New Delhi and choose the previous path that led to the least expensive destination, you discover that all the flights to the city with the least expensive destination are cancelled. You go back to New Delhi. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the least expensive destination. Which city from New Delhi will lead to the path where one can find the least expensive destination?

Step 1: Identify the new path.
Path 3: New Delhi -> Yangon -> Dhaka -> Bangkok (Total expenses: Unknown)

Step 2: Recall the previous least expensive path.
Path 2: New Delhi -> Kathmandu -> Beijing -> Thimphu (Total expenses: $400)

Step 3: Determine that flights to the previous least expensive destination are cancelled.

Step 4: Choose the new path as the only available option.
Path 3: New Delhi -> Yangon -> Dhaka -> Bangkok

Answer: Yangon
